name: メタルボディ
effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 50%

desc_short.1: 減少80%物理、魔法傷害+提高50%全屬性耐性
desc_short.0: Decrease physical and magic damage by 80% and boost all elemental resistances by 50%
desc_short.2: 물리, 마법 피해량 80% 감소+모든 속성 저항력 50% 상승
desc_short.5: Reduce el daño un 80% y aumenta resistencias elementales un 50%
desc_short.4: Verringert ph. und mag. Schaden um 80 % und alle Resist. hoch um 50 %

desc_long.1: 減少80%物理、魔法傷害並提高50%全屬性耐性的數值。
desc_long.0: Reduces physical and magic damage taken by 80% and boosts all elemental resistances by 50%.
desc_long.2: 물리, 마법 피해량이 80% 감소하고, 모든 속성 저항력이 50% 상승합니다.
desc_long.5: Reduce el daño un 80% y aumenta resistencias elementales un 50%
desc_long.4: Verringert physischen und magischen Schaden um 80 % und alle Resistenzen hoch um 50 %.
